option.name: content
option.value: Avoid overly verbose descriptions or unnecessary details. Use conventional commits.

list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat(phone): improve phone number validation and formatting
- Use `formatIncompletePhoneNumber` for better partial number formatting - Simplify phone input logic and enhance parsing accuracy - Update `PhoneInput` component with hidden input for binding raw values - Change phone validation schema to handle incomplete phone numbers more gracefully - Improve `phone-input.svelte` user experience and maintain consistent behavior across the application
# Conflicts: # .idea/workspace.xml

Playwright.Workshop Interest System.should display planned workshops in calendar view
Playwright.Workshop API.should create workshop as admin

task.summary: Default task

Add guardian support for underage waitlist entries
Introduce `waitlist_guardians` table and transactional logic for adding guardian details when underage users join the waitlist. Updates include database migrations, UI adjustments for conditional input fields, validation logic, and tests to ensure age-based gating.

Update `waitlist_guardians` to reference `profile_id` instead of `waitlist_id`
Replaced `waitlist_id` with `profile_id` across database schema, relationships, and scripts to align with updated data model. Adjusted related seeding logic and server routes to ensure consistency and maintain functionality.
`feat: add guardian information to views, RLS policy, and UI components`
`feat: add medical_conditions to member management view and members-table`
`feat(stripe): update to API version 2025-04-30, dependencies and improve transaction handling`
chore: updated gitignore
chore: updated gitignore
feat: implemented invitations list of members
chore: e2e test for invitations

feat: add bulk invite functionality and UI enhancements for waitlist management
- Added `complete_member_registration` SQL function for handling member registration. - Enhanced waitlist table with bulk invite feature using Supabase functions. - Introduced `SendIcon` button for inviting members with tooltips. - Refactored background processing logic for invitations. - Improved state management, query handling, and updates for waitlist invitations.
chore: add database schema and data source configuration files

feat: add invite management and UI enhancements
- Replaced `complete_member_registration` SQL function with API-based invite workflows. - Added resend invitation API and related UI updates for waitlist. - Improved waitlist filtering (`status`). - Updated Stripe API version. - Enhanced IDE configuration and standardized code formatting.

feat: enhance invite workflow and UI; improve IDE config
- Added API-based invite workflows, replacing `complete_member_registration` SQL function. - Introduced resend invitation API and related UI updates for waitlist. - Improved waitlist filtering by `status`. - Updated Stripe API version. - Refined IDE configuration and applied consistent code formatting.
feat: refactor invitation to use invitation id instead of tokens

feat: added migrations for new email invite processing.
It now uses the uuid of the invite as a route and sends an email manually.

feat: added migrations for new email invite processing.
It now uses the uuid of the invite as a route and sends an email manually.
feat: added functions for email processing using a supabase queue.
feat: refactored admin endpoint to add emails to the queue.

feat: improve invite workflow with email processing and confirmation logic
- Added support for email processing using Supabase queue. - Introduced cookie-based invite confirmation tracking. - Updated public signup pages to reflect invite confirmation status. - Adjusted layout for mobile responsiveness.
chore: updated svelte shadcn

feat: add tab navigation and selection to beginners workshop page
- Introduced dynamic tab switching with `Select` component. - Tabs now persist in URL for a better user experience.

feat: add tab navigation and selection to beginners workshop page
- Introduced dynamic tab switching with `Select` component. - Tabs now persist in URL for a better user experience.
chore: updated readme
fix: correct transactional id
feat: integrated posthog
feat: css fixes
feat: club activities implementation plan
feat: member workshop calendar

feat: migrate workshop calendar to native Popover API with TypeScript improvements
- Replace Schedule-X calendar with vkurko/calendar (@event-calendar/core) for better Svelte 5 compatibility - Implement native Popover API instead of custom positioning logic for better accessibility and performance - Add comprehensive TypeScript interfaces (CalendarEvent, EventClickInfo, EventContentInfo) removing all 'any' types - Fix text visibility issues in popover with proper CSS color overrides - Enhance event content rendering with interest count and user interest status - Improve null safety with proper checks and fallback values - Maintain all existing functionality while improving code maintainability
ðŸ¤– Generated with [opencode](https://opencode.ai)
Co-Authored-By: opencode <noreply@opencode.ai>

feat(workshops): update styles to align with shadcn design system
- Adjust calendar event colors and theming using shadcn variables - Update workshop modal and popover styles for consistent theming - Refactor CSS for better readability and maintainability - Enhance "Interested" badge with updated styles and accessibility

feat(workshops): add interest tracking and improve "My Workshops" page
- Introduce interest tracking for workshops with interest counts and user-specific status - Add interest toggle button in workshop list with loading state and accessibility improvements - Replace calendar view with workshop list for better usability - Refactor "My Workshops" page to use tabs for better organization
feat: implemented workshops payment
feat: implemented workshop attendee management

feat(workshops): add E2E test for full workshop lifecycle with admin and attendees
- Introduce E2E test covering workshop creation, attendee registration, cancellations, refunds, and attendance marking - Enhance `workshop-event-modal` with delete/cancel popovers and loading states - Update `supabase` package to v2.31.8 for API consistency and feature support - Refactor modal styles and button actions for improved UX and accessibility

feat(workshops): add cancellation and refund functionality
- Introduce workshop cancellation dialog with refund eligibility checks - Implement refund eligibility utility function with detailed checks - Enhance workshop list with cancellation buttons and refunded badge - Update calendar and API to include registration status and counts - Refactor user registration actions for better state handling and UX
feat: added workshop update feature
fix: remove payment session from bulk invite
